contentrichtext.text: {{Refimprove|date=September 2011}} '''''La Rotonde''''' is the official [[French language|French-language]] student [[newspaper]] at the [[University of Ottawa]]. The newspaper publishes weekly throughout the fall and winter sessions on regular topics including news, arts and culture, sports, and travel. Previously owned by the [[Student Federation of the University of Ottawa]], ''La Rotonde'' achieved an independent status on May 1, 2008. A not-for-profit corporation, ''Les Publications La Rotonde Inc.'', has been created to manage the newspaper. Its directors are elected by University of Ottawa students during an annual general meeting.<ref>{{cite web | url = http://larotonde.ca/administration/ | title = Administration / La Rotonde | publisher = La Rotonde | accessdate = 2008-08-31 }} {{Dead link|date=September 2010|bot=H3llBot}}</ref> While ''[[Fulcrum (newspaper)|The Fulcrum]]'' is the official English-language student newspaper, the two publications are not repetitions of each other and offer unique, and sometimes conflicting, opinions. == References == {{Reflist}} ==External links== *{{Official website|http://www.larotonde.ca/}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Rotonde}} [[Category:Newspapers published in Ottawa]] [[Category:University of Ottawa]] [[Category:Student newspapers published in Ontario]] [[Category:French-language newspapers published in Ontario]] [[Category:Weekly newspapers published in Ontario]] {{Canada-newspaper-stub}} {{Canada-university-stub}} {{Ottawa-stub}}
